overview: Eun-ji quits acting and works as an assistant in Ms. Song's dressing room due to her husband, Se-il, who is a poor playwright and theater director. Jung-bin seduces Eun-ji with material abundance after meeting her in the dressing room and falling in love with her beauty. When Se-il sees Eun-ji enter a hotel with Jeong-bin, she decides to leave her son Han-sol and herself to work.
title: Days of Standing Alone
